summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of the AnimateDiff pipeline with PAG integration, covering component initialization, input handling, attention slicing, noise generation, configuration consistency, device and dtype compatibility, and optional modules such as IP adapters and xformers.
business_intent: Guarantee the stability and quality of the AnimateDiff PAG pipeline for deployment by detecting regressions early, confirming correct behavior across diverse settings, and supporting rapid development cycles.
